gorup.new_member_welcome: Welcome to the group, {name}! Please introduce yourself.

command.link: Here is the group link: [Group Link]
command.report: Thank you for reporting the issue! It will be reviewed by the admin team.
command.future: Please wait for future updates regarding this issue. Thank you for your patience.
command.info: Here is the information about the group: [Group Info]
command.admins: Here are the current admins of the group: [Admin List]
command.purge: Purging messages... This may take a moment.
command.news: Latest news in the community: [News Updates]
command.lock: The group is now locked. No new members can join.
command.unlock: The group is now unlocked. New members can join.

help.general: I am here to assist you! To see a list of commands, use the `/commands` command in a private chat with the bot.

start.Private:
Welcome to CMCOP!
 I am the dedicated robot and police of Codemodule community.
 Use the /help command to explore my features and commands.

commands.private: Use this command in a private chat to interact with the bot.
commands.public: This command is only available in private chats. Please use it there.
